Key Arguments: The submission argues that the Australian government is illegitimate and has been for decades, claiming it does not represent the people.
It asserts that the government uses misinformation and disinformation labels to suppress truth and control the population.
The submission claims that the ACMA is an unlawful and unconstitutional body with no authority to determine truth.
It suggests that the government's actions during the COVID pandemic were criminal and violated citizens' rights.
The submission emphasizes the importance of free speech and argues that the proposed legislation is a form of censorship akin to communism.
Main Themes: Misinformation and disinformation as tools of control
Notable Quotes: Governments DO NOT have any mandate for harming the people.
All information is legitimate and needs to be said.
Silencing the People is NOT Democracy, it is Communism.
Our Constitution IS THE LAW! Everything else is FRAUD.
